text: puok yeahou ti ning na sa r ni ban aahang tha puok yeung kuchea kaun robsa a l laoh ning chea bandaul chetd robsa trong . chaur anak( mou ham meat) tb vinh tha dau che neah hetoaveibeanchea trong thveutearounakamm puok anak daoysaarte ampeubeab robsa puok anak? phtoytowvinh puok anak ka chea mnoussa knongchamnaom anak del trong ban bangkeut der . trong aphytosa champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea haey trong ka thveu tearounakamm champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea der . kar krob krong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei ning avei del mean rveang vea teangpir chea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . haey champoh trong temuoyokt chea kanleng vilotralb
